caption.center: In re Franklin ELLINGTON v. STATE.

opinion.posture: Certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals.
opinion.attorneys:
J. M. Sides, Anniston, for petitioner.
No brief for the State.
opinion.opinion_text:
Petition of Franklin Ellington for Certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals to review and revise the judgment and decision of that Court in Ellington v. State, 51 Ala. App. 12,282 So.2d 360.
Writ denied.
HEFLIN, C. J., and MERRILL, MADDOX and FAULKNER, JJ., concur.
